Device.Name: ADT7301ARTZ-500RL7,ADT7301ARMZ,ADT7301ARMZ-REEL7,ADT7301ARTZ-REEL7
Device.Description: The ADT7301 is a complete temperature monitoring system.It contains a temperature sensor and a 13-bit ADC. It has a flexible serial interface which is compatible with SPI protocols.
Device.KeyWord: ADT7301 Temp, Temperature, Sensor, SPI, ADC
